author: jukka
msg: JCR-1649: Separate NOTICEs and LICENSEs for binary and source packages
- Moved all component NOTICEs and LICENSEs to src/main/resources/META-INF
- They are now automatically included in artifacts, so removed the explicit
- The NOTICE and LICENSE files on the trunk level remain as they were,
they are the files that cover our source releases
